reviews.content: Very tasty food, you just keep on eating

The restaurant is for VIPs, the price is quite expensive, about 1 million/person. It's a waste to eat at this restaurant when going out drinking :)). There's no need to discuss the service, fast service, enthusiastic and ‚Ä¶
Easy to find address, convenient parking Delicious food Friendly and attentive staff Reasonable price
Old Hanoi restaurant, nostalgic space but the interesting thing is drinking Western wine. The restaurant prepares quite delicious dishes and the service is very attentive, Great
Delicious food, beautiful decoration. Enthusiastic staff, always present and proactive. Great dinner experience in both food and service. Will recommend to friends and company!
Accidentally came in to take shelter from the rain but I really liked it because the food here is delicious and the staff is enthusiastic. Will come back.
Very delicious hotpot Cozy space Very suitable for cold weather 10d
